director.name: 尼克·科里罗西 Nick Corirossi
查尔斯·英格拉姆 Charles Ingram

this_title: Live at the Necropolis: The Lords of Synth
introduction: With Haley's Comet in the skies above, three contestants battle it out with their synthesizers for the elite title of the "Lord of Synth." The two losers face being banned from music for 100 years. When their music mistakenly draws Haley's Comet toward earth, we have to ask ourselves "can these three enemies come together to "achieve harmony" and save earth?
chinese_title: Live at the Necropolis: The Lords of Synth
